DOC.HEADLINE: SOUTHLAND PREVIEW / THE BUSINESS WEEK AHEAD : ORANGE COUNTY
DOC.TEXT: Unemployment Statistics Due : The county ' s June unemployment_rate is expected to be released Friday.The rate , which stood at 7.1 % in June , 1993 , has been falling_in recent months and reached a 29-month low of 5.3 % in May . But analysts expect the jobless numbers to rise , because rates typically jump in June as students and teachers seek summer work . For example , according to previously published figures , the Los Angeles County rate for June rose to 10.1 % from May ' s 9.7 % .
